title: fuck you riot get a TRIBUNAL ARLEADY ITS 2015

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
theres the history for my latest win

4v5 fucking retard nidalee FEED 0/14 and still get the VICTORY CAUSE HE DIDNT AFKED

FUCK YOU RIOT AGAIN AND AGAIN I POST ABOUT 4v5 and geez u cunts need to get your shit together

this time a feeder 0/14 gets the win cause the team i was on had to carry it with 3 inhibds down and still manage to win.

how can you guys not ban people or start fixing issues like these.

replies.body: Idk, did they intentionally feed? I checked their match history and in that game they got 110 cs (which does not look like intentional feeding). The only thing that concerns me is lack of assists. It also seems that this is their only game that this magnitude of death occurred in.

yes they intentionally fed.

BECAUSE jungle didnt gank just once and then the feed began.

if i could of recorded it you could see or

IF A RIOTER COULD TRACE THE GAME AND SHOW THE CHAT LOG
Also, bots do this. Shit i team fights but scripted to farm efficiently.

Will you complain about the same thing if it was enemy team who has that?

Yes it sucks to have it, but it mostly evens out.

Report the man and ignore him tho.

no its not about infavour of complaining

its that people like him needs a tribunal for OCE to deal with

its cause we dont have one people run a %%%%ing muck

you can just have a bad day and ruin it for everyone else knowing you'll never get banned etc.

unless you play with a rioter

Umm... I don't agree with what you say.
Because Nidalee went 0/15.
lol typo my bad thought it was 14 holy %%%% 15 deaths zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
People always complain when there's a 4v5 in their opponents favour, I've yet to see someone complain about a 4v5 in their favour...

Btw intentionally feeding is extremely easy to get away with and always will be. The automatic systems only trigger if you literally run it down mid non stop or if you go mobis with 5 zeals.

If people want to int and not get banned they can just pretend to be very bad at the game and die a lot of times but still buy the right items and kill minions etc. No system could tell the difference between this and a legitimately bad player. Even if we got tribunal I doubt Riot would want the people reviewing the cases to take action unless they were 100% sure it was inting.

So basically you can easily int in lol so long as you buy the right items kill minions/go for objectives and don't flame in chat. Don't ask me how I know this but I do.

Riot they don't care anymore, they just love protecting trolls and feeders in this game. if someone cuss out the trolls and the feeders out of frustration, they get ban. Am starting to think Riot have a bunch of incompetent %%%%s working there :(
